content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 8-15)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipes forming two pipe groups (water and steam systems)
- Small electric pole (position 3.5, 6.5) connecting to power network

### Iron Mining and Smelting Operation at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest (position 17.5, 70.5) collecting iron ore (currently contains 14 ore)
- Stone furnace (position 16.0, 75.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter (position 17.5, 75.5) transferring plates to output chest
- Wooden chest (position 18.5, 75.5) for plate output (currently contains 20 plates)

### New Iron Production Line at position (38.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 38.5, 70.5) facing down
- Wooden chest (position 38.5, 72.5) collecting iron ore (currently contains 14 ore)
- Stone furnace (position 41.0, 74.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter (position 39.5, 73.5) transferring ore to furnace
- Wooden chest (position 42.5, 73.5) for plate output (currently empty)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent inserter placement issues
- Repeated failures placing output inserters at furnace positions (16.5,75.0), (21.5,70.5), (33.5,73.5), (41.5,73.5)
- Solution: Ensure 1-tile clearance around furnaces for inserter placement and proper orientation

### Distance-related placement errors
- Attempted to place small electric pole at (18.5,69.5) while too far away (71.92 distance vs max 10)
- Solution: Move closer to target position before placing entities

### Furnace operation issues
- Multiple furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" despite having fuel
- Solution: Verify inserter positions and orientations are correctly transferring materials
- Ensure input chests contain ore and inserters have fuel

### Mining drill warnings
- Both mining drills have full output chest warnings (positions 17.5,70.5 and 38.5,72.5)
- Solution: Empty output chests regularly or expand storage capacity

### Assertion error on furnace status
- Assertion failed checking furnace1.status == WORKING
- Solution: Verify all furnace requirements are met (fuel, input materials, output space) before status checks

### General placement recommendations
- Clear target areas completely before attempting placements
- Double-check entity orientations before placement
- Verify power connections for electric entities
